Articles.Content: IRL, asteroids have platinum in it, and alot of other things. Worth is about 200 bil in US$ (source- http://www.kurzweilai.net/how-much-is-an-asteroid-worth) so i am making (i think and hope) a MM Patch to make asteroids worth money when they land. Not sure if possible. Maybe just modify the PotatoRoid CFG and make it. I don't know, but I am working on it.

MM patch is chosen. Testing on a Career save. Gonna redir it to a water landing, and recover and check the moniez. Chose 20tril funds. Actually, gonna change to 20bil.

Edited August 16, 2014 by kenbobo
Hyperediting a asteroid into orbit, gonna deorbit, water land, and check the FUNds i get.
Cool idea but the funds need to. Be more balanced to what the rocket costs. If nasa could make $2 billion from a $100,000 rocket they'd never have funding pro lems again

At 20 billion funds, might as well just edit your persistence file or play Science v. Career.

Also an easier way to play with asteroids is to either use HyperEdit, or spawn one in the VAB.
